prompt:
Use AI selector plugin for natural language element selection

Input: Select elements using natural language description

Generate a WebQL query:

Configure AI selector plugin with OpenAI

Input: Set up AI selector to use OpenAI GPT models

Generate a WebQL query:
completion:
# Export environment variables:
export AI_SELECTOR_API_KEY="sk-your-openai-key"
export AI_SELECTOR_MODEL="gpt-4o-mini"
export AI_SELECTOR_ENDPOINT="https://api.openai.com/v1/chat/completions"

# Then run your query:
drweb -q ai_query.json5 -o results.json

prompt:
Configure AI selector plugin with local Ollama

Input: Set up AI selector to use local Ollama models

Generate a WebQL query:
completion:
# Export environment variables:
export AI_SELECTOR_ENDPOINT="http://localhost:11434/api/chat"
export AI_SELECTOR_MODEL="llama3.2:3b"

# Make sure Ollama is running:
ollama serve

# Then run your query:
drweb -q ai_query.json5 -o results.json

prompt:
Use JSON-LD extractor plugin

Input: Extract structured data from JSON-LD markup

Generate a WebQL query:

Use API extractor plugin

Input: Intercept and extract data from AJAX API calls

Generate a WebQL query:

List all available plugins

Input: Show all installed WebQL plugins

Generate a WebQL query:

Get detailed plugin information

Input: Show detailed information about a specific plugin

Generate a WebQL query:

Enable a disabled plugin

Input: Activate a plugin that was previously disabled

Generate a WebQL query:

Disable a running plugin

Input: Deactivate a plugin temporarily

Generate a WebQL query:

Install external plugin from PyPI

Input: Install a community plugin

Generate a WebQL query:
completion:
drweb plugin install drweb-plugin-selenium
# or
pip install drweb-plugin-awesome

prompt:
Use output format plugin for LLM training

Input: Format extracted data for machine learning training

Generate a WebQL query:

Use smart retry plugin for robust extraction

Input: Configure intelligent retry logic with exponential backoff

Generate a WebQL query:

Use proxy rotation plugin

Input: Configure proxy rotation for large-scale extraction

Generate a WebQL query:

Check plugin compatibility

Input: Verify if a plugin is compatible with current DR Web Engine version

Generate a WebQL query:

Use multiple plugins together

Input: Combine AI selector with JSON-LD extraction

Generate a WebQL query:

Create custom plugin configuration

Input: Configure plugin with custom settings

Generate a WebQL query:
completion:
# Create plugin config file:
# ~/.drweb/plugins.yaml
ai-selector:
  enabled: true
  config:
    model: "gpt-4o-mini"
    max_tokens: 1000
    temperature: 0.1

jsonld-extractor:
  enabled: true
  config:
    validate_schema: true
    include_context: false

api-extractor:
  enabled: false

prompt:
Use plugin for data validation

Input: Validate extracted data using plugin

Generate a WebQL query:

Debug plugin issues

Input: Troubleshoot plugin problems

Generate a WebQL query:
completion:
# Enable debug logging for plugins:
drweb -q query.json5 -o results.json -l debug

# Check plugin status:
drweb plugin list

# Get detailed plugin info:
drweb plugin info problematic-plugin

# Check plugin logs:
tail -f ~/.drweb/logs/plugin-debug.log
